strings.evolution:
These treasures can give me strength?
These visions, what bodies they have!
strings.affinity:
I want you and I to always be...
Uh oh... A pirate can't allow herself to be seen crying.
strings.description: A pirate boss located in Olderion. Born to a wealthy merchant family, she lost all but a single ship when her family's business collapsed which she filled with criminal ruffians before beginning her life as a pirate. Her belief is that even the poor should be able to eat, and it is with this kind determination that she faces those who dare stand before her.
strings.fusion:
He he, thanks for the power.
I'll hack away at your enemies with my trusty axe!
strings.summon:
This body...it's top rate.
Since I have been called, I will lend you my power. That is what makes me a pirate.

strings.affinity:
I want you and I to always be...
Uh oh... A pirate can't allow herself to be seen crying.
strings.description: The young head of a pirate clan that patrols the seas around Olderion. She's not just a pretty face, boasting powerful axe-wielding strength and unshaken charisma that separates her from the rest of the ruffians. All this points to a past which, given the comparatively peaceful state of Olderion, is surrounded in mystery as to how and why she became a pirate.
strings.fusion:
That was a surprise!
It gave me its power...?
What a strange fellow!
strings.summon:
Hey, why are all you here?!
Visions?
How strange, fate is...

strings.evolution:
Oh yeah, I like that!
Please, give me more of those wonderful treasures!
strings.affinity:
I want you and I to always be...
Uh oh... A pirate can't allow herself to be seen crying.
strings.description: A female pirate boss located in Olderion. Those who dare to flaunt their style before her are quickly taken down by her axe. Even in Olderion, a country considered to be fairly prosperous, there exist poor areas. It is from these areas that she gathered ruffians to patrol the seas with her, usually preying on those who flaunt their wealth.
strings.fusion:
Are you sure about this?
Should you be making me this strong...?
You never know, I might end up going after you all!
strings.summon:
Where are we? M-my henchmen...
This is the body of a vision?
Oh, I'm glad the real me is still safe...
